radiographic_examinations.findings: Posterior fusion defects at T9–11, L4–5, and S-1 together with partial sacral agenesis and costal abnormalities.
Revealed a lumbosacral myelomeningocele sac, tethered terminal filum, and an associated syringohydromyelic cavity above the thoracic SCM.
Detailed the thoracic diastematomyelic median osseous septum indicating a Type I SCM.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The SCM was located seven vertebral segments above the proximal border of the myelomeningocele sac.
